Name: Damien
About the game: Damien is a first-person Slenderman like game. What happened here and why did people move out in such a hurry? A psychological horror game where fear and paranoia merge into a terrifying story! FEATURE EXPLORE Explore this creepy town, experience the terrifying journey, and discover the secrets within. SURVIVAL A terrifying spirit is roaming in this place, one mistake could lead you to hell. So, be careful, you’ll need more than a little luck. PUZZLE However, the horror spirit is not the only threat you’ll face. Find clues, try to unlock secret doors and rooms, and piece together the truth. COLLECT Find messages left by previous occupants of the building, discover the history inside this town. GAMEPLAY A first-person horror adventure game. Players explore the abandoned town, uncover its unknown secrets, and face threats along the way.
